title: Currency Transaction Reports (CTRs) - customer copies
personalDataVerified: Customer name, transaction amount, transaction date, financial institution name, CTR filing confirmation
personalDataVisible: Link to financial institution system (IRS and customer, requires authentication)
rationale: Customer receives verifiable copy of CTR filing for large cash transactions. Domain binding verifies financial institution. Tamper-evident transaction record. IRS Bank Secrecy Act compliance. Prevents disputes over reported amounts. Critical for cash-intensive businesses where CTR filings must be documented. Customers verify accurate reporting of their cash transactions.
